column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////What a fabulous addition to the River Oaks area! Special thanks to Layton for inviting us! The place was packed on a Tuesday night. I had the Bosscat burger. One of the best burgers I've had in Houston! The buns are even homemade and melt in your mouth. They use very high-quality beef. The homemade fries were delicious too. My friends loved their food. Layton took great care of us at the bar. He is the best mixologist in Houston and I always love trying his concoctions. He even surprised us with the red velvet churros for dessert. Yum! One of the managers showed us the unique whiskey room
